name: tablance
description: (TABLe advANCE) Component for creating tables similar to datatables.net but it does not rely on jquery. It is noticeably faster, especially when filtering/sorting large tables. One are where it really shines is the ability for having expandable rows with a complex data-structure inside. It also has an option for making it function like a spreadsheet when it comes to navigation and editing.
author: Oscar Jonsson
